sentence.Network_en: Put a pan of salted water on to boil.
Grate a tablespoonful of fresh ginger into a pan.
sentence.Network_cn: 磨碎一汤匙鲜姜，放入平底锅。

sentence.Network_en: Empty the contents of the pan into the sieve.
sentence.Network_cn: 将锅里的东西倒到筛子上。

list.abs: the tale of the pie and the patty - pan ., 馅饼和馅饼锅的故事.

means.word_mean: 1. a pan for cooking patties or pasties

auth_sentence.content: Turn off the heat and set the pan aside.

auth_sentence.content: Return the pan to a medium to high heat.

auth_sentence.content: Sprinkle the flour into the pan and stir well.
